mapper.select: SELECT board_file_no,board_no,file_path,file_name , reg_date, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(reg_date), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') reg_date_fmt , CONCAT(file_path, file_name) encodedFilePathName FROM brd_lecture_file WHERE board_file_no = #{fileNo}
SELECT a.title ,b.board_file_no ,b.file_name ,b.file_path FROM brd_lecture a, brd_lecture_file b WHERE a.board_no = b.board_no AND a.board_no = #{board_no} ORDER BY b.board_file_no

SELECT a.board_no , a.pkey , a.user_no , b.user_name user_nm , a.pkey , CASE WHEN a.pkey = 0 THEN '' ELSE (SELECT p_title FROM top_lecture_process WHERE pkey = a.pkey) END AS pkey_nm , a.title , a.contents , a.reg_ip , a.reg_date , DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.reg_date), '%Y-%m-%d') reg_date_fmt , a.view_cnt , (select count(board_file_no) FROM brd_lecture_file where board_no = a.board_no) file_cnt , (SELECT MAX(board_file_no) FROM brd_lecture_file WHERE board_no = a.board_no) board_file_no , (select count(*) from brd_lecture_memo where fk_no = a.board_no) memo_cnt FROM brd_lecture a, top_mbr_bsc b WHERE a.user_no = b.user_no AND 1=1
AND a.title like '%${boardSrcWord}%'
AND (a.title like '%${boardSrcWord}%' OR a.contents like '%${boardSrcWord}%')
AND b.user_name like '%${boardSrcWord}%'
AND a.pkey = #{titleSearch}
AND a.board_type = #{boardType} ORDER BY a.board_no DESC LIMIT #{queryPgNoInt}, 18

SELECT a.board_no , a.pkey , (select p_title from top_lecture_process where pkey = a.pkey) pkey_nm , a.user_no , getTopMbrBscUserName(a.user_no) user_nm , a.title , a.contents , a.reg_ip , a.reg_date , DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.reg_date), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') reg_date_fmt , a.view_cnt FROM brd_lecture a WHERE a.board_no = #{board_no} ORDER BY a.board_no DESC

SELECT board_file_no,board_no,file_path,file_name , reg_date, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(reg_date), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') reg_date_fmt , CONCAT(file_path, file_name) encodedFilePathName FROM brd_lecture_file WHERE board_no = #{board_no} ORDER BY board_file_no
mapper.update: UPDATE brd_lecture SET view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 WHERE board_no = #{board_no}
UPDATE brd_lecture SET contents = REPLACE(contents,#{oldStr},#{newStr}) WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
